page.title: 19Royston Junior Mixed School
page.content: Our school is the oldest in Royston. Up to 1955 the school was two separate boys and girls schools and an infant school in the same buildings. The present Junior Mixed School was formed in 1968. In July 1986 Royston Junior School wll close because of many problems. The school is 89 years old (1896). Empty classrooms are not being used. The number of children is getting less 1968 414 children 13 staff 1985 217 " 9 " Sep. " 193 " 8 " The cost of heating and repairing the building is very high. In Sept 1986 the children will move to a new Royston Junior & Infant School being built at Summer Lane or to a J & I school at the present Royston Infants School.
